data.title: Dead or Alive
data.meta_description: Is Mel Torme dead or alive? Find out at the Dead or Alive Data Base. This reference site helps you keep track of which famous people are alive and which ones have died.
data.text:
Mel Torme

Dead

Born: 9/13/1925 in Chicago, Illinois, USA

Died: 6/5/1999

Age: 73

Cause of death: stroke

Full name: Melvin Howard Torme

Nickname: The Velvet Fog

Noted For: jazz singer and pop crooner; co-wrote "The Christmas Song"; hits include "Blue Moon" (1949).
